content.rendered:
Selfless Services

(The Selfless Service of GEOKC is Devotional Practice to Lord Krishna)
Practice Performed Without Any Expectation of Result

GEOKC Selfless Service Team:

  • GuruSeva
  • Donation Seva: See Causes and Giving, Ways to Give
  • Programs Seva:
    • Spiritual Discourses
    • Bhakti Sadhana
    • Satsang Services
    • Program of Ten Avatars of Lord Vishnu
    • Ashram Spiritual Guidance
    • Shop For Lord Krishna
  • Anna Daan
  • Preeti Bhoj Sponsorship
  • Tulsi & Flower Sponsorship
  • Guest Seva:
    • GEOKC Guests
  • GEOKC Events Seva:
    • GEOKC Events
  • Serve on Board Committee:
    • GEOKC Board Openings
  • Become Bhakti Yoga Teacher (Volunteer)
    • Gurus and Staff
  • GEOKC Campaigns Team
  • Seva From Volunteers

Please select any area of selfless services as seva to help us. The forms of selfless services are as follows:

  • Selfless Services Form 
  • Volunteer Application Form
